name: phase-messenger
description: Inter-phase communication plugin for Agent Shepherd - enables messages between workflow phases

commands.name: phase-msg-send
commands.description: Send a message from one phase to another

commands.name: phase-msg-receive
commands.description: Receive pending messages for a phase

commands.name: phase-msg-list
commands.description: List all messages for an issue or phase

author: Agent Shepherd Team
